cheyenne.meetingHighlights: Capital-city meetings with strong evening and lunchtime options; active newcomer programs.
cheyenne.transitInfo: Cheyenne Transit and regional highways (I-25) provide access; most attendees drive locally.

casper.meetingHighlights: Active local fellowship with steady evening meetings and periodic speaker events.
casper.transitInfo: Local bus services and regional highways; Casperâ€“Natrona County International Airport for regional flights.

laramie.meetingHighlights: University-linked meetings with flexible schedules for students and staff; strong lunchtime attendance.
laramie.transitInfo: Local bus service and drive access via I-80; Amtrak and regional services nearby.

gillette.meetingHighlights: Evening and weekend meetings with strong community support; mining-industry population participation.
gillette.transitInfo: Regional highway access and local bus services; most attendees drive to meetings.

rock-springs.meetingHighlights: Community-focused meetings with steady weekend attendance and occasional speaker nights.
rock-springs.transitInfo: Local transit and regional highways; small regional airport and drive access to larger hubs.
